column4: Tell me please how to create shortcut for right mouse click....
you could use mouseemu.  Or you could use xbindkeys in combination with xvkbd or xdotool
read the man page, it explains.  For example, I use "b:10"
http://www.nongnu.org/xbindkeys/xbindkeys.html#configuration might help you too.  But the man page is not long, so you should read it
